mods.abstract: $25 Reward. RANAWAY from the subscriber, at Prairie Faquetaique, in this Parish, about four months ago, a dark mulatto-girl, named PATIENCE, aged about 22 years, 5 feet in height, speaking french only and very quick, she has a beautiful face and fine features for a slave. I will give the above reward to any person bringing her back to me. JOSEPH FUSELIER. St. Landry, September 30th, 1854.-1m.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
